docs.snippet: Manchester United defender Chris Smalling is ready for a strong second half of the season as his side prepare for the first leg of League Cup semi-final against Hull City on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manchester United defender Chris Smalling is ready for a strong second half of the season as his side prepare for the first leg of League Cup semi-final against Hull City on Tuesday.

headline.main: United's Smalling Focusing on Strong Finish to Season

docs.snippet: The Trump Organization pulled out of a $250-million real estate project in ex-Soviet Georgia to avoid a potential conflict with Donald Trump's role as president, Trump's former business partner in the project told Reuters....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Trump Organization pulled out of a $250-million real estate project in ex-Soviet Georgia to avoid a potential conflict with Donald Trump's role as president, Trump's former business partner in the project told Reuters.

headline.main: Exclusive: Trump Pulled Out of Project in Ex-Soviet Georgia to Avoid Conflict of Interest-Ex-Partner
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Trump Pulled Out of Project in Ex-Soviet Georgia to Avoid Conflict of Interest-Ex-Partner

docs.snippet: Alabama Sen. Jeff Sessions fervently rejected "damnably false" accusations of past racist comments Tuesday as he challenged Democratic concerns about the civil rights commitment he would bring as Donald Trump's attorney general. He vowed at his co...
docs.lead_paragraph: Alabama Sen. Jeff Sessions fervently rejected "damnably false" accusations of past racist comments Tuesday as he challenged Democratic concerns about the civil rights commitment he would bring as Donald Trump's attorney general. He vowed at his confirmation hearing to stay independent from the White House and stand up to Trump when necessary.

headline.main: I'd Stand Up to Trump as AG, Sessions Tells Senators
headline.print_headline: I'd Stand Up to Trump as AG, Sessions Tells Senators

docs.snippet: Germany's interior and justice ministers agreed Tuesday to toughen the rules on deporting failed asylum-seekers and monitoring extremists — a response to last month's deadly truck attack on a Christmas market....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany's interior and justice ministers agreed Tuesday to toughen the rules on deporting failed asylum-seekers and monitoring extremists — a response to last month's deadly truck attack on a Christmas market.

headline.main: Germany Toughens Security Rules in Response to Berlin Attack
headline.print_headline: Germany Toughens Security Rules in Response to Berlin Attack

docs.snippet: British retail sales picked up speed in December, an industry survey showed, but sales of bigger ticket items were sluggish, a possible early sign that consumers are bracing for a Brexit hit to their spending power....
docs.lead_paragraph: British retail sales picked up speed in December, an industry survey showed, but sales of bigger ticket items were sluggish, a possible early sign that consumers are bracing for a Brexit hit to their spending power.

headline.main: Christmas Sales Boost UK Retailers, but Non-Food Sales Sluggish-BRC
headline.print_headline: Christmas Sales Boost UK Retailers, but Non-Food Sales Sluggish-BRC

docs.snippet: The chairman of Germany's Social Democrats (SPD), Sigmar Gabriel, has decided to run against conservative Angela Merkel for the chancellorship in September's federal election, the newspaper Bild reported on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chairman of Germany's Social Democrats (SPD), Sigmar Gabriel, has decided to run against conservative Angela Merkel for the chancellorship in September's federal election, the newspaper Bild reported on Tuesday.

headline.main: German SPD Boss Gabriel Will Challenge Merkel in Election, Bild Says
headline.print_headline: German SPD Boss Gabriel Will Challenge Merkel in Election, Bild Says

docs.snippet: Nintendo's hit smartphone app, Pokemon Go, and other augmented reality games are unlikely to be rolled out in China any time soon, after the state censor said it would not license them until potential security risks had been evaluated....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nintendo's hit smartphone app, Pokemon Go, and other augmented reality games are unlikely to be rolled out in China any time soon, after the state censor said it would not license them until potential security risks had been evaluated.

headline.main: China Not to License Pokemon Go, Similar Games as It Weighs Security Risks
headline.print_headline: China Not to License Pokemon Go, Similar Games as It Weighs Security Risks
